main: ^A stranger! What are you doing here?! We have a crisis here, don't disturb us!
^What happened, maybe I can help you?
lost: ^I wanted to officially open this new building. It will be our new renovated tomb! Very important for all of us, but I can't do it without my mace! I lost it and I don't even know where. Did you see it? If you find it, I will grant you a big prize!
^I will look for it, don't worry.
trade: ^LUCKY ME! That's it! That's my mace. Thank you traveler, take this as a sign of my gratitude.
